title: New: AQUILO â€“ Part Of Your Life
body:
British duo **AQUILO** continue their fantastic start to 2014 by dropping another cut taken from their forthcoming debut EP.

_Part Of Your Life_ is sombre in tone, and elegant in composition, relying heavily on the silky vocals and graceful synth lines. Check out Part Of Your Life below, and pre-order the four track EP [here](https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/aquilo-ep/id825624911).

Part Of Your Life is sombre in tone, and elegant in composition, relying heavily on the silky vocals and graceful synth lines. Check out Part Of Your Life below, and pre-order the four track EP here.
